amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to the energy workforce pilot grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3066 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3066 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 2953.
